mapper.update: update base_ugroup_member set id=id ,ugroupid=#{ugroupid} ,userid=#{userid} ,isleader=#{isleader} where id=#{id}

update base_ugroup_member set id=id ,ugroupid=#{ugroupid} ,userid=#{userid} ,isleader=#{isleader} where 1=1 and id in (${Where_IdsStr}) and id=#{Where_id} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and userid=#{Where_userid} and isleader=#{Where_isleader}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.userid "userid", t.isleader "isleader" from base_ugroup_member t where id=#{id}

select t.id "id", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.userid "userid", t.isleader "isleader" from base_ugroup_member t where 1=1 and t.id=#{id} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.userid=#{userid} and t.isleader=#{isleader}

select t.id "id", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.userid "userid", t.isleader "isleader" from base_ugroup_member t where 1=1 and t.id=#{id} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.userid=#{userid} and t.isleader=#{isleader}
mapper.delete: delete from base_ugroup_member where 1=1 and id in (${Where_IdsStr}) and id=#{Where_id} and ugroupid=#{Where_ugroupid} and userid=#{Where_userid} and isleader=#{Where_isleader}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.ugroupid "ugroupid", t.userid "userid", t.isleader "isleader" from base_ugroup_member t where 1=1 and t.id=#{id} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.userid=#{userid} and t.isleader=#{isleader}
select count(*) from base_ugroup_member t where 1=1 and t.id=#{id} and t.id!=#{NoId} and t.ugroupid=#{ugroupid} and t.userid=#{userid} and t.isleader=#{isleader}
